overviewEmployeesTableDesc: Overview of all registered employees in your organization.
addTableDataDesc: Insert table data according to the selected date. The changes you make will affect all charts.
noDatEntryToUpdate: There is no data entry to update on the date you selected.
noDataEntryToDelete: There is already no data entry on the date you selected.
willBeDeletedConfirm: Statistics for employees on the selected date will be deleted. Do you accept?
alreadyHaveData: There is already a data entry for this date. You can delete and update the data for this date.
youMustAddLeastOneEmployee: To add a data entry to the selected date, you must add at least one employee.
alreadyHaveEmployeeSameName: There is already an employee with the same name. Please check and try again.
requiredField: The {{field}} field is a required field.
requiredAndMinCharField: The {{field}} field is a required field and must be at least {{min}} characters.
name: Name
lastEmployeeConfirm: This is your last employee, if you delete all your employees all existing charts will be reset. Do you accept?
